4.0.5.en: Improve support for GoodWe systems with multiple inverters

4.0.10.en: Add battery sensor for storage-enabled GoodWe systems

4.0.11.en: Add battery sensor for storage-enabled GoodWe systems

4.0.14.en: Add SolarEdge temperature measurement, improve pairing process

4.0.15.en: Implement flow triggers for SolarEdge inverter temperature

4.3.1.en: Bump minimum Homey version, add source code URL

4.3.3.en: Hide consumption capability for non-supported SolarEdge devices

4.4.5.en: Add local Omnik support, deprecate Omnik Portal connection

4.4.6.en: Add local Omnik support, deprecate Omnik Portal connection

4.6.2.en: Add support for SAJ eSolar WiFi modules

5.0.22.en: Support Apps SDK v3 + Homey Cloud

5.0.23.en: Upgrade deps, fix Enphase HTTPS issue

5.1.0.en: Add Growatt support to SDK v3 version

5.2.0.en: Improve Growatt implementation, support multi-plant multi-device
